title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy S21 FE sees first discount at $100 off, ecobee SmartThermostats, more
content:
All of today’s best deals include the first cash discount on the new Samsung Galaxy S21 FE at $100 off. That’s alongside ecobee SmartThermostats from $149 and Samsung’s Galaxy Z Fold 3 at $253 off. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy S21 FE sees first discount at $100 off, ecobee SmartThermostats, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The very first cash Galaxy S21 FE discount has arrived at $100 off via Amazon alongside the ongoing Galaxy Z Fold 3 sale and more.
